@mightycritic ehema kaloth apa rate eka sinhala geniyek Wath ithuru venne ne. Me kathave ettha nettha hoyanna nam "SMUDHRA DEVI" TRAIN eke dawasak gaman kara balanna! SINHALA genunta gedara eka lawak  (eya lokayata penwanna) vedakarana aayathanaye ekak. (EMA aayathanaye aithikaru ho pradaniya samaga) prawahanye ekak  (dumriye ho buswala) me madagahanna kiyana katha nevei. Itha wagakeemen saha kampaaven kiyanne. Kuruvita "PARADISE " kiyala gammanayak thienawa. Yuddayedee merunu hamuda sebalunge vendambu genuntai ethi gewanne deela thiyenne. Ema gammane inna genunta aniyam pemwathun dekak thuna innawa. Vedienma polisiye aya saha aarakshaka angsaye ayai. Meya paapee gnanasarage wage boru nevei. Hoyala balanna vetahei. Sinhalun itha pahath thathveta  veteegena yanawata pilithuru hoyanne nethuwa anawashya dewal karanna yaamen SINHALUNTA SAHA BUDDHAGAMTA vena haaniya ananthai apramanai. Aho dukaki.
